title: Servers Fked Up?
body: I for some reason can not log in. Keeps kicking me out. Any help would be greatly appreciated. I hear some people are also suffering the same problems so please help me. Thanks

replies.body: Why isnt riot doing or saying anything

Yeh nice shifting of the blame rofl,
So even when people aren't with Optus, it's their fault
and even when Optus users can access internet just fine and use EVERYTHING else but LoL, it's their fault
how stupid do you think people are?
I would talk about alternate routing paths, peering paths, IX's, and various network engineering terms, but i doubt you are even willing to try and understand...
I agree I m not with telstra or optus and I having trouble as well

Best to contact player support, to help you out. 

Out of interest, which ISP are you with? and where are you located?
Im located in Western Australia and with westnet

Same. I'm on Optus network.

Also can't connect to https://support.riotgames.com/

Anyone in the same situation?

YEs i am,
it says some %%%% about is webpage not bieng avaliable
We noticed a large drop of Optus players. Please check http://optus.custhelp.com/app/service/status/list for the latest Optus outage notice
haha hilarious and pathetic blaming Optus for the crappy servers
It's not the crappy servers idiot, it's evidently Optus users and it's been consistent throughout the year... Don't start blaming Riot for problems out of their control nerd

I don't agree.. I don't think it's Optus at fault here.
I'm with Telstra, and still can't connect.
Also all other online games are working fine, so it does really point to Riot having a fault.
Before you start just flaming people, explain why non-Optus users also cannot connect. It's just Riot shifting the blame game again like they've done all year.
I have a friend with optus, he cant connect to anything. I am with Telstra and I can connect GG no re.

jesus how is it possible for a person to be this thick,
you must've voted for Tony Abbott
Optus hasn't had consistent problems throughout the year, Riot said that TPG was at fault with the "firewall error".

> Optus hasn't had consistent problems throughout the year, Riot said that TPG was at fault with the "firewall error".

I see what you're trying to imply.... here's my rebuttal :-)

1. Anecdotal evidence aside, I would challenge your statement about Optus (see the last few weeks @ https://aussieoutages.com/top10/)

2. The firewall issue affected mostly TPG players AND it was resolved by TPG improving their connectivity to our game servers. So who would you say was 'at fault'?

3. Optus had an significant outage last night that would have caused issues for many of our players.  **But this does not mean everyone else is immune from connectivity issues**

**If anyone else is having issues connecting, please contact player support.**

Sorry I'm not sure if it's shown through boards formatting (it isn't for me at least), I was replying to MrNiceGuy123 who said that Optus had consistent problems with LoL throughout the year. I know TPG has had problems with LoL, one of which being the "firewall error" which wasn't a firewall error. I thought the person I was replying to had confused Optus to TPG.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TywmpMQYojs
I am with Optus and i am in none of those areas yet my client is not working.
Same.

I have both optus and telstra internet, and im having issues connecting with both. I obviously have internet since i'm replying on here so its not an outage of my isp. Both are unable to connect to server. Telstra worked for a little while after I started getting issues with optus, but then conked out as well.
Pretty sure your would still only be on the one network. especially if your not in a major city

Optus Wholesales from Telstra. All ISP's in Australia Wholesale from Telstra.

However, he could a dongle and land connection? Or have 2 different lines ? or KS from his neighbours wifi

Close but not quite. Using 2 different mobile broadbands. 
You used to be completely right, but now Telstra only owns the majority of internet service In Australia, optus has since built its own complete service, which they lease out to some competitors, just like Telstra.
TL;DR optus can fck up its service, and Telstra can still work, and vice-versa
tru

Might have got something to do with today's storm in Sydney.
I mean it was a pretty bad storm, maybe something blew from the lightning?!
Servers need more Armor or MR?
Riot, could you please keep us updated on whats happening. Say like every half an hour or so idk. i just really wanna play but, some "issues" are stopping me from playing -.-

LOL, hahahaha I reckon everyone is feeling the same way as you. Tbh im getting really tired of waiting. But waiting is apart of life. Just let them do what they do. But I can tell you right now that I feel exactly the same way as you and im slightly losing my patience hahahahahah
Guise it's working for me now. Try now
where do u live what suburb?

I was playing a game, finished it, went to invite my friend and got disconnected from PVP.net chat service... So i closed LoL and re launched and it would allow me to get past launcher, type in user and pass and it would say logging on... for about 20 seconds until it said cannot connect to pvp.net server ra ra ra-. I have been muddling with my settings and searching forums for over 3 hours now and don't understand why the flipping hell this is happening. My mate who is with Optus is fine and playing still, ( I'm with Vivid Wireless.... Lol, I know...) and cannot for the life of me get onto league... Pissed of Riot.. And the fact you blame optus also is pretty lame. Fix your shiet please.{{item:3060}}
im not on a optus network but experiencing same problem. dont think its your isp's fault
THANKS OPTUS  (╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻)
When is it comming back on ffs

did nature get reported and banned for saying "fked up?"
i sure hope so, that kind of language is not tolerable.
thats kinda harsh
happened to me today
same problem? again is it cause the rain is affecting it or some%%%% plyaed few 1 hour ago doesnt work again

Yeah a few of my friends couldn't connect yesterday and they were all on Optus.
After around an hour or two of trying to login, they eventually were let in.
I'm a Telstra user and i was not affected.

same working now
Appears to be fixed, I'm on!

its seems there is some communication i with the server. I get past the authentication but wont log in.

Internets working fine otherwise. id also like to know how this is an ISP issue.

Anyone notice the downtimed started the same time as yesterday??? It eventually kicked everyone at 11:30??? And it was a hardware fault???

But i'm with Telstra, not Optus / Wholesellers. 

I think RIOT is just overloaded and need to upgrade there hardware and improve there in/out bandwidth!

I keep hanging. And the game is lagging. 

Telstra - Campbelltown, NSW - No ISP outage or issues!
